channel.title: [PI] The Real Project RuneScape [PI]
channel.description:
[center]Ok so i know you are going to say like it's leeched and everything but it's not..... Props to Im sanity for the PI source
[size=14pt]There is just 1 rule. 1. If it's not on the first page then bump it :P[/size]
Ok so when the title says 'The Real RuneScape Remake', IT IS THE REAL RUNESCAPE REMAKE!!!! The Teleports are all accrurate, the shops are like RuneSacape, Welcome screen, Ancients and Modern ONLY. (Lunar is there but only if you really want it). 100% Specials, Members Only items, Requires membership for certian items E.G Barrows or Dragon etc.
D claws and Vesta etc are there BUT THERE IS NO SPECIAL ATTACK AND I USE IT LIKE CURRUPTED ETC... These items are no where to be seen and are very rare to get from Monster drops... The monsters have good drop rates as well.
The starter is just like RuneScape. 35gp, Shortbow, bronze arrows etc like 2006 RuneScape.
The server is NOT COMPLETE. There are loads of things needed to do for the server and i cannot be bothered to sort it out...
Features:
[ul][li]RuneScape Starter like[/li] [li]Members Objects[/li] [li]Really easy Starter for you to edit[/li] [li]All shops in the main city's are there (Varrock Lumbridge falador catherby etc)[/li] [li]You start at the Tutorial island and you talk to him about the server etc...[/li] [li]Real life shops that you can change in an instant[/li] [li]Autocasting works for ALL staffs[/li] [li]All runes can be used.[/li] [li]100% WEAPON ANIMATIONS!!!![/li][/ul]
Bugs:
[ul][li]Wildy doesn't work nor does multi[/li] [li]The monster doesn't respawn when it dies[/li] [li]When heading to the north of Varrock it sometimes freezes[/li] [li]Teleporting takes a long time to teleport[/li][/ul]
Things that needs to be added/fixed
[ul][li]Wildy and multi combat[/li] [li]All skills working[/li] [li]100% PVP and skills[/li] [li]No Dupes or anything like that[/li] [li]Home teleport needs to be added for ALL Spell books[/li] [li]'global-objects.cfg' needs to be added[/li] [li]When you trade with someone and you move the shop doesn't close[/li][/ul]
That's the text sorted now here are some pictures of it
[img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Welcomescrean.png[/img] [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Equipmentinterface.png[/img] [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/IKOD.png[/img] [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Modern.png[/img][img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Ancient.png[/img][img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Lunar.png[/img] [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Animation0001.gif[/img] [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Animation0002.gif[/img][img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Animation0003.gif[/img][img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Animation0004.gif[/img][img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Animation0005.gif[/img][img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Animation0006.gif[/img] [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Animation0009.gif[/img] [img]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Animation0011.gif[/img]
Anti virus
Anti virus
[IMG]http://filesmelt.com/dl/Avast.png[/img] [IMG]http://filesmelt.com/dl/SASW.png[/img]
Errm Now i don't know what else to say about it, except that you need to fix the bugs because i don't know how to do that lool
Credits: Me - 85% Insanity - 15%
The server i used was Project Insanity so 100% goes to him for using HIS SERVER I don't know who i used for the client but 100% goes to him for the client
Downloads:
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?hr454qb2jq14h2p]Download the Rar file here[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?hr454qb2jq14h2p]Download the Zip file here[/url][/center]

First of all, Fantastic Source and what not for a [PI]

But, I can’t seem to figure out where the quest section is under, (Where you have it saved)\Server\src\server\model

There should be a quest folder to add quests and custom quests?

Anyone can help me?
